Al-Quran Verse Memorization
Why i do this ?
  • Religious principle
  • Understanding God Law
  • Master in language like arabic,english and bangla
  • habit
Target

350 x 5 = 1500 verse,from surah nas(114) to surah at-tur(52).The middle surah between them is surah 83

one from top and one from bottom will be cover respectively,The al-quran bangla+english mobile app will be used for this course
